name: MiniJam 127: Cat Games
description:
For this MiniJam we set out to create a set of mini games based around the color palette provided where you play as a cat! Unfortunately due to time limitations we could only include one of the games, which is a game where you have to stand on the correct color before the timer runs out! If you survive, you get a point!

In the future I plan on making points unlock new cosmetic items as we did create these but I ran out of time to implement the!

Software used:

  • Unreal Engine 5.1.1
  • Blender

Credits

  • Models and art to @Soupp_Art_
  • Development to me!
  • Music by Patricia Taxxon whose work is amazing and you should definitely check out!
